com.google.android.exoplayer.drm

Class StreamingDrmSessionManager<T extends ExoMediaCrypto>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer.drm.StreamingDrmSessionManager<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DrmSessionManager<T>

    public class StreamingDrmSessionManager<T extends ExoMediaCrypto>
extends Object
implements DrmSessionManager<T>
    A base class for DrmSessionManager implementations that support streaming playbacks using ExoMediaDrm.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  StreamingDrmSessionManager.EventListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be notified of StreamingDrmSessionManager events.

    • Field Detail

      • WIDEVINE_UUID

        public static final UUID WIDEVINE_UUID
        UUID for the Widevine DRM scheme.

      • PLAYREADY_UUID

        public static final UUID PLAYREADY_UUID
        UUID for the PlayReady DRM scheme.

        Note that PlayReady is unsupported by most Android devices, with the exception of Android TV devices, which do provide support.

      • PLAYREADY_CUSTOM_DATA_KEY

        public static final String PLAYREADY_CUSTOM_DATA_KEY
        The key to use when passing CustomData to a PlayReady instance in an optional parameter map.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • newWidevineInstance

        public static StreamingDrmSessionManager<FrameworkMediaCrypto> newWidevineInstance(Looper playbackLooper,
                                                                                   MediaDrmCallback callback,
                                                                                   HashMap<String,String> optionalKeyRequestParameters,
                                                                                   Handler eventHandler,
                                                                                   StreamingDrmSessionManager.EventListener eventListener)
                                                                            throws UnsupportedDrmException
        Instantiates a new instance using the Widevine scheme.
        Parameters:
        playbackLooper - The looper associated with the media playback thread. Should usually be obtained using ExoPlayer.getPlaybackLooper().
        callback - Performs key and provisioning requests.
        optionalKeyRequestParameters - An optional map of parameters to pass as the last argument to MediaDrm.getKeyRequest(byte[], byte[], String, int, HashMap). May be null.
        eventHandler - A handler to use when delivering events to eventListener. May be null if delivery of events is not required.
        eventListener - A listener of events. May be null if delivery of events is not required.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedDrmException - If the specified DRM scheme is not supported.

      • newPlayReadyInstance

        public static StreamingDrmSessionManager<FrameworkMediaCrypto> newPlayReadyInstance(Looper playbackLooper,
                                                                                    MediaDrmCallback callback,
                                                                                    String customData,
                                                                                    Handler eventHandler,
                                                                                    StreamingDrmSessionManager.EventListener eventListener)
                                                                             throws UnsupportedDrmException
        Instantiates a new instance using the PlayReady scheme.

        Note that PlayReady is unsupported by most Android devices, with the exception of Android TV devices, which do provide support.

        Parameters:
        playbackLooper - The looper associated with the media playback thread. Should usually be obtained using ExoPlayer.getPlaybackLooper().
        callback - Performs key and provisioning requests.
        customData - Optional custom data to include in requests generated by the instance.
        eventHandler - A handler to use when delivering events to eventListener. May be null if delivery of events is not required.
        eventListener - A listener of events. May be null if delivery of events is not required.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedDrmException - If the specified DRM scheme is not supported.

      • newFrameworkInstance

        public static StreamingDrmSessionManager<FrameworkMediaCrypto> newFrameworkInstance(UUID uuid,
                                                                                    Looper playbackLooper,
                                                                                    MediaDrmCallback callback,
                                                                                    HashMap<String,String> optionalKeyRequestParameters,
                                                                                    Handler eventHandler,
                                                                                    StreamingDrmSessionManager.EventListener eventListener)
                                                                             throws UnsupportedDrmException
        Parameters:
        uuid - The UUID of the drm scheme.
        playbackLooper - The looper associated with the media playback thread. Should usually be obtained using ExoPlayer.getPlaybackLooper().
        callback - Performs key and provisioning requests.
        optionalKeyRequestParameters - An optional map of parameters to pass as the last argument to MediaDrm.getKeyRequest(byte[], byte[], String, int, HashMap). May be null.
        eventHandler - A handler to use when delivering events to eventListener. May be null if delivery of events is not required.
        eventListener - A listener of events. May be null if delivery of events is not required.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedDrmException - If the specified DRM scheme is not supported.

      • newInstance

        public static <T extends ExoMediaCrypto> StreamingDrmSessionManager<T> newInstance(UUID uuid,
                                                                                   Looper playbackLooper,
                                                                                   MediaDrmCallback callback,
                                                                                   HashMap<String,String> optionalKeyRequestParameters,
                                                                                   Handler eventHandler,
                                                                                   StreamingDrmSessionManager.EventListener eventListener,
                                                                                   ExoMediaDrm<T> mediaDrm)
                                                                            throws UnsupportedDrmException
        Parameters:
        uuid - The UUID of the drm scheme.
        playbackLooper - The looper associated with the media playback thread. Should usually be obtained using ExoPlayer.getPlaybackLooper().
        callback - Performs key and provisioning requests.
        optionalKeyRequestParameters - An optional map of parameters to pass as the last argument to MediaDrm.getKeyRequest(byte[], byte[], String, int, HashMap). May be null.
        eventHandler - A handler to use when delivering events to eventListener. May be null if delivery of events is not required.
        eventListener - A listener of events. May be null if delivery of events is not required.
        mediaDrm - An underlying ExoMediaDrm for use by the manager.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedDrmException - If the specified DRM scheme is not supported.

      • getState

        public final int getState()
        Description copied from interface: DrmSessionManager
        Gets the current state of the session.
        Specified by:
        getState in interface DrmSessionManager<T extends ExoMediaCrypto>
        Returns:
        One of DrmSessionManager.STATE_ERROR, DrmSessionManager.STATE_CLOSED, DrmSessionManager.STATE_OPENING, DrmSessionManager.STATE_OPENED and DrmSessionManager.STATE_OPENED_WITH_KEYS.

      • getMediaCrypto

        public final T getMediaCrypto()
        Description copied from interface: DrmSessionManager
        Gets an ExoMediaCrypto for the open session.

        This method may be called when the manager is in the following states: DrmSessionManager.STATE_OPENED, DrmSessionManager.STATE_OPENED_WITH_KEYS

        Specified by:
        getMediaCrypto in interface DrmSessionManager<T extends ExoMediaCrypto>
        Returns:
        An ExoMediaCrypto for the open session.

      • requiresSecureDecoderComponent

        public boolean requiresSecureDecoderComponent(String mimeType)
        Description copied from interface: DrmSessionManager
        Whether the session requires a secure decoder for the specified mime type.

        Normally this method should return MediaCrypto.requiresSecureDecoderComponent(String), however in some cases implementations may wish to modify the return value (i.e. to force a secure decoder even when one is not required).

        This method may be called when the manager is in the following states: DrmSessionManager.STATE_OPENED, DrmSessionManager.STATE_OPENED_WITH_KEYS

        Specified by:
        requiresSecureDecoderComponent in interface DrmSessionManager<T extends ExoMediaCrypto>
        Returns:
        Whether the open session requires a secure decoder for the specified mime type.

      • getError

        public final Exception getError()
        Description copied from interface: DrmSessionManager
        Gets the cause of the error state.

        This method may be called when the manager is in any state.

        Specified by:
        getError in interface DrmSessionManager<T extends ExoMediaCrypto>
        Returns:
        An exception if the state is DrmSessionManager.STATE_ERROR. Null otherwise.
